summary: Spruces up Windhelm with flora and some dunmer influences.
descriptionHtml:
I was always so disappointed with how plain and ugly Windhelm was, so I've made this to give it some more life. It is not lore-friendly since I have added plants and insects that would not exist in such a cold climate or grow. It also adds quite a few dunmer lanterns which I don't know the nords would like. But too bad, it looks nicer :) maybe they have grown more tolerant through the Dragonborn's influence. Also the dunmer have quite the green thumb apparently... 

I may add some more to this later or tweak, but for now I'm happy with it. It was made for my personal use, but I uploaded to share. Please don't complain it's not to your exacting specifications because it was just what I thought was 'pretty' and not meant to be perfect or to anyone else's taste except mine. I am very happy if you like it too, though! 

I [i]strongly [/i]recommend the latest version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]SFO[/url]. Without it, you may have floating lanterns, since the vanilla trees will look different/be diferent sizes. 

Please note that in the screenshots I am also using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55063/?]Trees in Cities[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27845/?]Christmas Lanterns[/url]. It just means the fancy Christmas tree in front of the palace and a few extra trees. Not a major difference. I rec those mods if you want it exactly the same! ENB used was [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42957/?]Mistveil ENB Shades of Autumn[/url].

Cleaned with TESVEDIT. 

For this mod you will need:
[list][*][size=2]Skyrim.esm[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Update.esm[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dragonborn.esm[/size][/*]
[/list]
There will be no version without Dragonborn because the mod uses so many assets from it.
author: mrsalenko
